snippet: South African rugby coach Allister Coetzee will from July only be able to select overseas-based players who have more than 30 international caps in a policy aimed at protecting the domestic game....

headline.main: Daimler to Recall One Million Mercedes Globally After 51 Fires
headline.print_headline: Daimler to Recall One Million Mercedes Globally After 51 Fires

lead_paragraph: South African rugby coach Allister Coetzee will from July only be able to select overseas-based players who have more than 30 international caps in a policy aimed at protecting the domestic game.
